text:
@GrandpaSnarky @NikkiHaley should be ashamed of herself!! Trump is the most corrupt man to EVER inhabit the oval office & his failure to control the coronavirus is appalling!! 
#TrumpDeathToll137K 
#TrumpCriminalEnterprise 
#GOPComplicitTraitors 
#GOPCorruptionOverCountry 
#ToxicTrumpMustGo
